rows.label: bf11340100_0010
rows.name: That wasn't like you.

rows.label: bf11340100_0015
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Bitter laugh

rows.label: bf11340100_0020
rows.name: You think so?

rows.label: bf11340100_0030
rows.name: Yes.

rows.label: bf11340100_0035
rows.name:
I thought... You always know what
to do, you're never lost.

rows.label: bf11340100_0040
rows.name: I wish that really were the case.

rows.label: bf11340100_0045
rows.name: To tell the truth, I'm always worrying.

rows.label: bf11340100_0050
rows.name: Ever since I became Hikari's Driver, anyway.

rows.label: bf11340100_0060
rows.name: It didn't seem that way at all.

rows.label: bf11340100_0070
rows.name: Power lends one an air of capability.

rows.label: bf11340100_0075
rows.name: Even moreso when it comes to the Holy Grail.

rows.label: bf11340100_0080
rows.name:
When we first met...
We could have burned you to pieces.

rows.label: bf11340100_0090
rows.name: Though fortunately we avoided that thanks to Shin

rows.label: bf11340100_0100
rows.name: Is that why...you were away from the militia?

rows.label: bf11340100_0110
rows.name: As I am, I am not in full control of Hikari's power.

rows.label: bf11340100_0120
rows.name: Scores of soldiers could die by my hand...

rows.label: bf11340100_0130
rows.name: I was frightened.

rows.label: bf11340100_0140
rows.name: This cataclysm Metsu caused...

rows.label: bf11340100_0150
rows.name:
It's likely all because Deacon Marveni
was unable to control him.

rows.label: bf11340100_0160
rows.name: And if that's true, then perhaps I too...

rows.label: bf11340100_0170
rows.name: I think she's well aware.

rows.label: bf11340100_0180
rows.name: Just not so comfortable saying it.

rows.label: bf11340100_0190
rows.name: That's your analysis?

rows.label: bf11340100_0200
rows.name:
Well, I have been with Shin, the 
"Paragon of Iira", for 17 years

rows.label: bf11340100_0210
rows.name:
I can roughly tell how much of their strength
a Blade is using just by watching them.

rows.label: bf11340100_0220
rows.name: She's making sure you-

rows.label: bf11340100_0230
rows.name:
No, she's holding herself back to
make sure she doesn't go that way.

rows.label: bf11340100_0235
rows.name: Deep down she's very kind.

rows.label: bf11340100_0240
rows.name: You think?

rows.label: bf11340100_0245
rows.name: That still means...I'm just not man enough.

rows.label: bf11340100_0250
rows.name: Don't think that way.

rows.label: bf11340100_0260
rows.name: You'll get used to it, little by little.

rows.label: bf11340100_0265
rows.name: I was the same.

rows.label: bf11340100_0270
rows.name: If only time would slow down and afford me the chance.

rows.label: bf11340100_0280
rows.name: Yeah...
